message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on something truly valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. I'm willing to pay that price for it.

I understand your offer of $80, but I'm still not willing to let it go for that price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $85. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $82.50. I'm willing to pay that price for the product.
I'm not willing to go all the way to $82.50, but I'm willing to compromise again. I'll offer it to you for $84. I think this is a fair price considering the value of the product.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still not sure if $84 is the best price for me. I'd be willing to pay $82 for the product.

I understand you're still hesitant, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $83.50. I think this is the best price I can offer, considering the value of the product. If you're willing to meet me at this price, I'm willing to make a deal.
